snippet: Odd-even gas rationing is ending in Nassau and Suffolk Counties at 11:59 p.m. Friday, though rationing will remain in effect until further notice in New York City.
abstract: Odd-even gas rationing is ending in Nassau and Suffolk Counties at 11:59 p.m. Friday, though rationing will remain in effect until further notice in New York City.

headline.main: Gas Rationing Ending on Long Island Friday Night
